content: difficulty the word mysterium is rooted in ancient greek and latin and is known as a plural of mystery or secret also described as various unknown elements thought to make up existing forms of matter or a substance seen as an elemental or pure form of something else new patterns sometimes feel like a collection of mysteries the more we allow ourselves to be a beginner and make mistakes the more knowledge we will be able to collect unravel the mystery of new techniques with this drop-shoulder tee sizing available to fit up to a 30 - 63 76 160cm bust with approx 7-9 5 18 24cm of positive ease measure your bust at its fullest circumference to pick your ideal size the model is a 37 94cm bust wearing size 3 size information and schematic are available on page 4 techniques cast on knit purl yarn over increasing decreasing cable cast-on lace bind-off yarn this tee is designed for fingering weight or light dk i used hikoo® popcycle in #3015 charm popcycle is 50% bamboo 50% polyester from recycled plastic bottles 1 hank equals 100g /305y 3 5oz / 279m yarn requirements 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 3 balls 3 balls 3 balls 4 balls 4 balls 5 balls 5 balls 6 balls 6 balls 850 yds 900 yds 915 yds 1200 yds 1220 yds 1480 yds 1525 yds 1675 yds 1830 yds 777 m 823 m 836 m 1097 m 1115 m 1353 m 1394 m 1532 m 1673 m needles gauge shorter needles us 4 3 5 mm 16 40 cm 20 sts & 30 row = 4 10 cm in stockinette circular needles for sleeves approx 5 sts x 7 5 row per 1 2 5 cm after blocking longer needles - us 4 3 5 mm 24 80 cm circular notions needles or length needed to knit body circumference between 20-36 stitch markers depending on size tapestry needle scrap yarn or stitch holders scissors © copyright dear ingénue | all rights reserved | 2021 v 1 2 2 additional notes this drop-shoulder tee is knit seamlessly from the top-down with sleeves being knit onto the body after the fact chart and written instructions for the chart are both available instructions for special techniques are also included in the pattern numbers for each size are shown in the same color throughout the pattern when only one number is given in black it applies to all sizes abbreviations bobble bind off co cast on eor end of row increase increase k knit k2tog knit two stitches together p purl pm place marker rem remain ing repeat s repeat s rm remove marker round s round s rs right side sl slip one stitch purlwise ssk slip one knitwise slip one knitwise knit both slipped stitches together st s stitch es slwyf slip one stitch purlwise with yarn in front ws wrong side yo yarn over mysterium © hannah mann of dear ingénue 2021
